text: we all know the story of Steve Jobs the
man who designed modern technology and
made technology touch our fingers with
his wonderful creations for which the
world would remember him for centuries
however there are a few facts about
Steve Jobs you don't know that which
shocks you such as Jobs had a child with
Kristen brendan from his high school
girl called Lisa even after a DNA test
proved he was the father he still
continued to deny it
claiming he was sterile but later
acknowledges her as his daughter
he named the computer Apple Lisa after
his daughter he experimented with
psychedelics which means effects of a
drug on the mind such as feelings of
deep understanding or unusually strong
experiences of color sound taste and
touch Jobs experimented LSD a few times
claiming that it was a profound
experience and one of the most important
things in his life he claimed it helped
him to think differently Jobs traveled
to India for seven months in search for
spiritual enlightenment
he meditated often and was a known
pescetarian eating fish but not meat he
also liked to walk barefoot when jobs
with 12 HP founder bill Hewlett offered
him a summer job after Spieth called him
asking for parts for an electronics
project it was known that Jobs had a
keen interest in engineering from a very
young age watch the complete video on
skillopedia the place to learn skills
for the real world to subscribe to our
Channel and stay updated with all the
new videos added at skillopedia
